page.title: 17Population of W.Bassett
page.content: {How many people live in Wootton {Bassett? } The census of 1981 showed there were 9,135 people living in Wootton Bassett.Now in 1985 there are about 10,000 to 11,000 people.There are 240 old age pensioners living in council property and there are about 700 council houses altogether. Some of us went to the High Street to ask people questions.We wanted to find out from those people who live in Wootton Bassett,how many were actually born here.We asked 15 people if they lived in Wootton Bassett and 11 said "yes".Ofthese 11 only 2 were born here though.The others came here because of their work or their marriage.We asked if they liked living here. 9 said "yes"and 2"no".One person said "it's a good commmunity".Another said"it's very central to other towns".
